job_description:
Senior Software Developer– Enablement Operations

Summary

We’re a naan traditional company…

We are seeking a highly motivated and self-driven senior software developer to build MS .NET/MVC based data driven applications. You will be part of an Agile Development team working on new application development using the latest technologies. We are a tech savvy organization where multiple development projects will provide you with the opportunity to contribute and be part of a dynamic and creative development team that delivers high value software solutions.

What FGF Offers

FGF believes in Home Grown Talent, accelerated career growth with leadership training. Unleashing Your Potential
Competitive Compensation, Health Benefits, & a generous flexible medical / Health spending account
RRSP matching program
Tuition reimbursement
Discount program that covers almost everything under the sun - Restaurants, gyms, shopping etc.

Primary Responsibilities
Design and implement innovative software solutions that are user-friendly, efficient, and reliable
Test and debug software applications to ensure quality and functionality
Collaborate with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to deliver successful software products
Evaluate and improve existing software applications to meet changing user needs
Keep up with the latest trends and developments in software engineering
Multitasking capabilities with high responsiveness.

Required Experience

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Engineering or relevant field
At least 3 years of experience in software development using various languages and frameworks such as C# .NET, Python, JavaScript, Telerik Kendo UI, Ajax, etc.
Demonstrated ability to create innovative software solutions that meet business needs and expectations
Experience with cloud platforms such as Microsoft Power Platform, AWS, Azure services, etc.
3+ years in a leadership role that required people and application management.
5+ years of experience with .NET and MVC applications
5+ years' experience with SQL Server development/database design
Proven record of accomplishment of on-time delivery of your work
Portfolio of previous software projects that showcase your innovation and creativity
Excellent communication, problem-solving, time management and goal setting skills
Great team player, quick learner

Nice to Have

Experience with Azure DevOps and CI/CD Pipelines
Data modeling and Database design
Familiarity with SharePoint administration including experience with lists, documents libraries, site creation, archival and search (creation, customization, management, etc.)

What is the recipe for a great career at FGF?

Working at FGF Brands, there is never a dull moment! As a successful company that is continually growing there is always challenging yet rewarding work to be a part of. We have an entrepreneurial spirit which encourages all our team members to use their own creativity and out of the box thinking to come up with solutions and new ideas.

Disclaimer The above describes the general responsibilities, required knowledge and skills. Please keep in mind that other duties may be added or this description may be amended at any time.
